HISTORICAL RECORD EQUALLED
Lionel Messi (@FCBarcelona) equals the legendary Gerd Müller (@FCBayern) on 525 official goals for a single club!
*This record is counting all official goals scored for one club in Europe's big five leagues.
#VillarrealBarça #FCBLive https://t.co/iDbAkI1j2m

.@Faitelson_ESPN: “With regard to @Cristiano winning his fifth Ballon d'Or, does he make the top 5 players in history? Not for me;
1. Leo Messi 2. @Pele 3. Diego Maradona 4. Alfredo Di Stéfano 5. @JohanCruyff 6. Zinedine Zidane 7. @Cristiano.”

.@Steviegrieve: “In 20 years, @Cristiano will be considered like a modern day Gerd Müller. A ruthless scoring machine.
Messi will be remembered as an entertainer who did the impossible on a weekly basis.
There never has been, or will be, a comparison between the two.” https://t.co/fvFc5GRLHx
